name: Tutorial | MetaHuman Facial Animation using LiveLink + AI Voice | Unreal Engine
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to use LiveLink to capture facial animation from your mobile device. It shows how to combine these captures with an AI-generated voice and animations derived from the voice audio file to achieve high-quality mouth animations and a polished final result in Unreal Engine, using only a mobile device and a PC.

name: Record and Cache Cloth Physics in Unreal Engine 5.6
description: This tutorial covers the process of recording and caching Cloth Physics simulations in Unreal Engine using the Chaos Cache Manager.

name: Extract Parts of A Character in Unreal Engine
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to extract parts of a character's Skeletal Mesh in Unreal Engine. This process is useful for cleaning up assets or reusing specific elements like guns or body parts in other characters.

name: Create Metahuman Clothes In Unreal Engine 5.6
description: In this tutorial, you will learn to create a Metahuman Wardrobe Asset. This asset can then be applied to the Metahuman Creator in Unreal Engine 5.6 through a Skeletal Mesh.

name: How to Create Your Own MetaHuman with Your Real Face Texture in Unreal Engine 5.6
description:
This full 45-minute tutorial provides a step-by-step guide on creating a custom MetaHuman using a real face scan and animating it with both body and facial motion in Unreal Engine 5.6. It covers the installation of Unreal 5.6, enabling necessary plugins, cleaning up scanned meshes in Blender, importing face scans, and creating a MetaHuman character.

The tutorial also details generating realistic textures, combining skin textures with MetaHuman UVs in Photoshop, animating the body with AI from video, adding face animation using Live Link Hub, and refining the animation to fix jitter. It is designed for those interested in building digital humans for virtual production, games, or exploring the technology.

name: Unreal Engine 5.6 How to Use Android Live Link Face for Real-Time MetaHuman Facial Animation
description: This tutorial shows how to use Android Live Link Face on an Android phone to drive a MetaHuman in real-time and create MetaHuman Facial Animation in Unreal Engine 5.6. It highlights a significant announcement that MetaHumans can now be used in any program.

name: How to Make Pretty Characters with MetaHuman Creator in Unreal 5.6
description: This video guides users on creating characters using MetaHuman Creator in Unreal Engine 5.6. It covers enabling the MetaHuman Plugin, creating a MetaHuman Asset and Identity with custom assets, and applying makeup.

name: New LED Wall, New Channel, New Discord, Oh My! (Plus Unreal Fest in June!)
description: This video discusses the process of building a new AOTO LED Wall, including connecting the render box to a Vicon system and running the first ICVFX shot. It also shares announcements like the expected release of UE5.6 at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 in June.

name: Metahuman Tutorial [Outdated]
description:
This tutorial provides a comprehensive guide to MetaHumans in Unreal Engine 5, suitable for both beginners and experienced users. It covers importing and setting up MetaHumans, facial and body animation without expensive motion capture, and lip-syncing with Metahuman Animator.

Additional topics include rigging and retargeting animations from Mixamo and Unreal Engine, and enabling cloth physics for realistic clothing movement.

name: Unreal Engine 5.5 Metahuman Audio To Facial Animation Tutorial
description: This video explores the new Unreal Engine 5.5 Metahuman Audio To Facial Animation Feature, which allows generating facial animation from a simple audio file for any Metahuman. This is a groundbreaking feature, especially when combined with optimized Metahumans in 5.5, enabling quick dialog or facial animated characters for games.

name: How to Make Mixed Reality Games - Meta XR MRUK Unreal Engine Tutorial
description: This tutorial guides you on how to make mixed reality games using Meta XR and MRUK in Unreal Engine. It covers installing the Epic Games launcher, the Meta XR plugin, and the Meta Quest Link App.

name: LIVE : Interact with AI Mai #audio2face #unrealengine #ai
description:
This video showcases a prototype AI, 'Mai', being developed for both desktop and Unreal Engine integration. The goal is to embody Mai in any character model, eventually allowing true virtual companionship in VR for activities like playing games or watching videos.

The video also mentions various uses for NeuroSync, including AI embodiment and animation tools based on text or audio inputs for games or VFX. It provides links to set up NeuroSync Open Source Audio2Face.

name: Renderiza con Calidad Extrema en Unreal Engine 5 - Configuraciones y Comandos
description:
This video teaches tricks and commands to achieve extreme rendering quality in Unreal Engine 5 by modifying settings and commands in the Movie Render Queue. It covers activating Movie Render Queue, basic configurations, color output, and anti-aliasing samples.

It also provides important commands for DOF quality, Motion Blur quality, Screen Percentage, Hair Strands DOF, and Nanite shadows, along with commands suggested by Unreal Engine documentation. The tutorial shows how to save configurations, combine Lumen and Ray Tracing, and troubleshoot Nanite shadow errors.

name: how to fix video memory exhausted in unreal engine 5 | unreal engine tutorial || ue5
description: This Unreal Engine tutorial helps beginners fix the "Video Memory Exhausted" error in Unreal Engine 5. It provides step-by-step instructions on checking graphics card memory usage, optimizing projects, and upgrading hardware if necessary. The guide aims to ensure a smooth development experience.

name: Beginners Guide : NeuroSync to Unreal From Scratch
description: This guide demonstrates how to go from an empty project to a NeuroSync Driven Metahuman in minutes. NeuroSync offers various uses, including AI embodiment and tools for animation based on text or audio inputs for games or VFX.

name: Control Rigs for Compatible Characters in Unreal Engine 5
description: This video explains that all "Epic Compatible" characters available in the FAB marketplace include an animation control rig, even if not explicitly bundled with the asset. It demonstrates how to enable this feature for animating Epic Compatible characters in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Gameplay Focused Level Design | Inside Unreal
description: This session explores level design concepts in Unreal Engine that lead to impactful and exciting gameplay opportunities. It includes live suggestions and questions from the audience.

name: Level up your MetaHuman Skills! Accessories, Auto Retargeting, and Smaller Files in Unreal 5.5!
description: This tutorial helps users unlock the potential of Unreal Engine 5.5 Metahumans. It covers seamlessly attaching accessories, mastering auto retargeting across characters, and optimizing projects for smaller file sizes without quality loss. The video provides professional tips and efficient workflows for game developers, animators, and 3D artists to enhance their Unreal projects.

name: How To Create The "Gravity Grab" In Unreal Engine 5 VR In Less Than 6 Minutes!
description: This tutorial aims to simplify the recreation of the "Gravity Grab" player interaction from games like Half-Life: Alyx in Unreal Engine 5 VR. It focuses on using clever function recreation and combining Move Component To/Line Trace for quick and seamless implementation of this popular feature.

name: Half-Life: Alyx Locomotion in Unreal 5.4.3 - Advanced Thumbstick Locomotion Tutorial | Re-Upload
description: This comprehensive two-hour tutorial meticulously recreates the locomotion system from Half-Life: Alyx in Unreal Engine 5.4. It is designed for developers looking to enhance their VR projects with advanced mechanics and visual effects. The tutorial covers mastering Unreal's blueprint system for responsive thumbstick locomotion, creating immersive translucent animated shaders, and designing professional-grade visual effects to bring VR environments to life.

name: Introduction to Virtual Reality, OpenXR Hand-Tracking, and Gesture Recognition in Unreal Engine
description:
This video introduces a VR tutorial series in Unreal Engine, focusing on OpenXR Hand-Tracking and Gesture Recognition. It covers setting up OpenXR Runtime, enabling Developer Runtime Features, basic project setup, and understanding OpenXR Data Format for hand tracking.

The tutorial also details functions like 'Get Joint Transforms' for drawing hands, 'Clear Hands', and 'Draw Hand', along with implementing 'Gesture Recognition' and 'Check Gestures' functions for spawning particles. It concludes with making the setup compatible with UE 5.5.

name: How to make Smooth Locomotion movement in VR | Unreal Engine 5
description: This tutorial shows how to implement smooth locomotion movement in VR within Unreal Engine 5, filling gaps found in other tutorials. It guides users through setting up the system for VR games, providing enough information to get started with VR movement.

name: Smooth Moving [Locomotion] & Smooth Turning | Unreal Engine 5 [VR] Tutorial
description: This is the first in a potential series of Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) VR Tutorials, focusing on achieving smooth movement (locomotion) and smooth turning. It offers an alternative to the default teleporting and snap-turn movement found in VR templates.

name: VR Procedural Grip Poses in Unreal 5.4 | How to Create Realistic Grip Animations for Any Object
description:
This tutorial guides users step-by-step in creating realistic procedural grip poses in Unreal Engine 5.4, enhancing VR projects. It covers setting up procedural grip poses, techniques for realistic grabbing animations, and tips for integrating the system using the Meta Quest 3.

The tutorial breaks down each step with clear visuals and detailed explanations, making it easy to follow. It also covers initializing Animation Blueprint on hand meshes, configuring the Grab Component, and creating custom hand animations within Unreal.

name: Create Entire Cities Automatically With PCG Splines! Procedural Content Generation in Unreal Engine
description: This step-by-step tutorial demonstrates how to use PCG Splines to automatically create a Medieval City with Spline Roads, leveraging the Procedural Content Generation Framework in Unreal Engine.

name: UNREAL ENGINE 5 VR | Adding Custom Hands to Levels
description: This video demonstrates how to replace the default Unreal Engine virtual reality template's controllers with custom hand models from Zectorlab's VR hands pack. It also shows how to navigate new levels with these custom hands.

name: UE5 VR SMOOTH LOCOMOTION | Unreal Engine 5.2 Tutorial + Environment Showcase
description: This tutorial provides a basic guide for setting up smooth locomotion based on joystick input in Unreal Engine 5 VR template. It offers a beginner-friendly approach to creating a smooth movement system, an alternative to teleporting.

name: Golden Dataset: Best Practices on Structuring Unreal Engine Data for AI Training | Unreal Fest 2024
description: This recorded session from Unreal Fest Seattle 2024 explores the critical importance of structuring data properly for AI training in Unreal Engine due to the rapid advancements in AI tool technology. The ICVR team discusses what constitutes a golden dataset, its advantages, and how to structure your pipeline effectively.

name: Get Started With Unreal Engine 5: Build VR Worlds for Virtual Reality
description:
This tutorial is the first lesson on building VR environments in Unreal Engine 5.3 or 5.4. It guides users through downloading and customizing a museum using free assets from the Epic Marketplace, transforming it into a full VR experience where users can teleport and personalize artwork.

Future lessons will cover incorporating video, sound, interaction, advanced movement, grabbing objects, and more. The video encourages engagement through questions and joining a Discord community, aiming to inspire and teach content creation tools for the Metaverse.

name: Build User Interfaces In VIRTUAL REALITY For Unreal Engine 5
description: This video demonstrates how to build 3D user interfaces in Unreal Engine 5 that can be interacted with using VR controllers. It covers widget design, blueprint setup, widget interaction components, and pressing buttons to achieve a final interactive result.

name: VR Hand Tracking in Unreal Engine 5.3 | Tutorial for Beginners
description: This tutorial simplifies setting up hand tracking in Unreal Engine 5.3.2, showing a step-by-step process that requires no coding. It demonstrates how to achieve working hands that track individual finger movements, compatible with all Meta Quest headsets.

name: How to set up HAND TRACKING in 10 MINUTES‚îÉUnreal Engine Meta Interaction SDK Tutorial
description: This video promises a robust hand tracking system capable of interacting with objects and UIs within 10 minutes. It covers downloading the Epic Launcher, the Interaction SDK, and the Meta XR plugin. The tutorial also references a more detailed video for enabling additional options.

name: Meta XR Simulator - Tutorial - Quest 3 & Unreal 5
description: This tutorial provides an overview of the capabilities of the Meta XR Simulator in Unreal Engine 5. It covers installation, an overview of the simulator's features, importing custom rooms in JSON format, and setting up hand tracking.

name: This Ai can Generate Blueprints in Unreal Engine (LINK IN DESCRIPTION)
description: This video showcases an AI capable of generating Blueprints in Unreal Engine. It demonstrates various functions such as generating passwords, assets, and random functions. The video aims to highlight the mind-blowing capabilities of this AI tool.

name: ¬øEl Fin de los Artistas 3D? Modelado 3D con IA
description: This video explores whether Artificial Intelligence can replace 3D artists by testing Meshy.AI, a platform that uses AI to generate 3D models from text and images. It showcases the results of creating various models, including a Viking barbarian, cupcake, different robots, a medieval helmet, a toucan, and a guitar.

name: I turned a 3D Gaussian Splat into a Detailed 3D Render.
description: This Unreal Engine 5 photogrammetry tutorial demonstrates a complete pipeline for creating 3D photogrammetry scans using an iPhone and importing them into Unreal Engine 5. It details how to make art in Unreal 5 by combining it with the Kiri Engine. The video is sponsored by Kiri Engine.

name: Make your 3D Gaussian Splatting easily -Turning a VIDEO into 3D [Free 3DGS Tool Tutorial]
description: This tutorial introduces XV3DTools, a Windows Local Training Tool designed to easily create 3D Gaussian Splatting ply models from MP4 videos. Gaussian Splatting is a recent 3D reconstruction technique for creating 3D scenes from multiple photos.

name: 3D Gaussian Splatting in Unreal Engine 5 for Beginners [Free 3DGS Plugin Tutorial]
description: This tutorial introduces the XVERSE 3D Gaussian Splatting (3D-GS) UE Plugin, a hybrid editing plugin for Unreal Engine 5 (UE5). Developed by XVERSE, it enables Gaussian Splatting model generation, rendering, and mixed editing within UE, leveraging UE5 Niagara for efficient rendering and management.

name: #UE5 Series: Introduction to Gaussian Splatting in UNREAL Engine
description: This step-by-step tutorial introduces Gaussian Splatting, its benefits, limitations, and implementation in Unreal Engine. It covers importing splats into Unreal and adjusting parameters for refined output. The video also features demonstrations of 3D and 4D Gaussian Splatting.

name: 50 Tips and Tricks in Modeling Mode | Unreal Fest 2024
description: This recorded session from Unreal Fest Seattle 2024 explores 3D modeling in Unreal Engine. It offers useful tips and tricks for both experienced and new users of Unreal Engine's modeling tools to streamline their workflow.

name: Make A Slider In Unreal Engine 5.4.3 For VR
description: This tutorial shows how to create a slider in Unreal Engine 5.4.3 for VR. It covers making the UE project, editing the VR Template, creating the Slider Blueprint, and using interfaces to drive a door. The video also addresses a common error during the process.

name: IMAGEN a MODELO 3D con IA (Compatible con Blender) | Tutorial
description: This tutorial introduces an AI tool for generating 3D models from images, compatible with Blender. It demonstrates experimenting with Meshy and MidJourney, an AI-powered toolkit for transforming text or 2D images into high-quality 3D models quickly. The video also mentions free alternatives like Krea.ai and Dream.ai.

name: Editing Skeletal Meshes in Unreal Engine 5
description: This video demonstrates how to edit the skeleton of an existing skeletal mesh in Unreal Engine 5 using UE5's Skeletal Editing Tools plugin. As an example, it shows how to add joints to a free F/A-18C asset to enable functionalities like folding wings and an articulated launch bar, which were not included with the original asset.

name: Architectural Visualization for Design Strategies on a 120 Year-Old Building | Unreal Fest 2024
description: This recorded session from Unreal Fest Seattle 2024 showcases how HOK, a design and architecture firm, used Unreal Engine for a project on Canada‚Äôs Parliament precinct. They developed a technical visualization and data workflow to display edited photogrammetric meshes with real-time lighting, creating a photorealistic 3D environment for client approval of alterations to a 120-year-old building.

name: How to Use MetaHuman Animator in Unreal Engine
description: This video teaches how to use MetaHuman Animator to produce facial animation for digital humans quickly. It explains how to capture facial performance using an iPhone and a PC, then convert it into facial animation for a MetaHuman. The tutorial also mentions the option of using a stereo head-mounted camera for even higher quality results.

name: Episode 06: Rigging
description: This video teaches how to easily and quickly rig a rigid prop in Unreal Engine, allowing characters to hold objects like guns, swords, or hula-hoops.

name: Cinematic Sound Effects (Royalty-Free)
description: This video presents Inferno SFX, a collection of royalty-free cinematic sound effects by Flame Sound, available for download. The library includes cinematic impacts, whooshes, braams, booms, transitions, tension builders, drones, and background textures.

name: 7-Minute Guide to UE5 State Tree Event Triggers
description: This 7-minute guide helps users understand UE5 State Tree Event Triggers. It demonstrates On Event Trigger functionality, discussing State Tree transitions and flexibility. The video is designed to assist game developers in their journey.

name: Animate Metahumans Using an Audio File in Unreal Engine 5.5
description: This video demonstrates a new feature from Unreal Fest 2024: the ability to animate Metahuman lip sync animation using only an audio dialog file in Unreal Engine 5.5. It provides a pre-release walkthrough of this functionality, noting that while effective, some aspects may change in the final release.

name: Unreal Engine 5.4 | How to use Metahuman Face Control Rig Picker ~ A Huge Time Saver
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to use Locodrome Metahuman Face Control Rig Picker in Unreal Engine 5.4. This intuitive tool simplifies control for any Metahuman face control rig within an Unreal Engine scene. It also mentions the availability of the free iClone Unreal Live Link Plugin and iClone 8.

name: Seminario Unreal C++ Espa√±a
description: This video is a seminar about Unreal C++ in Spain, focusing on programming within Unreal Engine.

name: Add Custom Animations to your AI Metahuman | Convai Unreal Engine Tutorial
description: This tutorial shows how to add custom animations to Convai-powered AI Metahuman avatars in Unreal Engine. It also provides tips on customizing the animation blueprint for simple actions like talking, interacting, and staring, as well as complex actions that involve scene interaction or other characters.

name: Victoria la Malague√±a se convierte en un holograma (primera prueba)
description: This video shows a first proof of concept where a character, Victoria la Malague√±a, transforms into a real-time hologram, demonstrating the ability to project any digital content as a hologram.

name: Story Development with Virtual Production in Unreal Engine
description:
This video course explores how to visualize a story using virtual production workflows in Unreal Engine. It covers live mocap, virtual cameras, timeline editing, sound addition, and lighting adjustments to accelerate concept exploration and iteration. The tutorial also highlights how immersive collaboration enhances creativity and allows viewing the story through characters' eyes, offering fresh perspectives.

It examines various workstreams for visualizing a script in a real-time engine, including location scouting, performance capture, and action breakdown. The video is supported by assets from ROTU Entertainment and Aaron Sims Creative.

name: Introducing Arcane Mirage, the Unreal Engine 5 Pixel Streaming Platform
description: This video introduces Arcane Mirage, a self-service Pixel Streaming platform for Unreal Engine 5, designed to make pixel streaming powerful, affordable, and accessible. It emphasizes the ease of getting started for both new and experienced Unreal Engine creators.

name: SETUP REMOTE PIXEL STREAMING IN UNREAL ENGINE 4.24+: Stream your app to any mobile or desktop device
description: This tutorial teaches how to set up pixel streaming for remote connection in Unreal Engine 4.24 and above. It explains how Epic Games' changes simplify the setup process by embedding Web RTC directly into the plugin. The video guides through the process of configuring an Unreal Engine project to stream to remote devices over the internet.

name: How to Make a Simple Flying AI in Unreal Engine 5
description: This quick tutorial demonstrates how to create a simple flying AI in Unreal Engine 5.

name: ‚ö†Ô∏è C√ìMO TRANSFORMAR TU LANDSCAPE CON NANITE TESSELLATION EN UNREAL ENGINE 5.4 üåü | ¬°LA VERDAD!
description: This video from UnrealXperts shows how to transform landscapes using Nanite Tessellation in Unreal Engine 5.4. It provides console commands for enabling Nanite Tessellation and aims to help users unlock their creativity in visual project development.

name: The Full Motion Matching Tutorial W500 Animations/ Walk, Crouch, Jump, TurnInPlace | UE5.4
description: This tutorial provides a complete guide to Motion Matching using 500 free animations provided by Epic Games in Unreal Engine 5.4. It covers topics such as importing animations, retargeting, setting up Default PSS and DataBases, and implementing components and Animation Blueprints. The video also explains Choosers, addresses fixing crouching issues, and discusses Air PSS, PSS Explanations, Turn In Place, and Traversals.

name: Game Animation Sample Walkthrough | Inside Unreal
description: This Inside Unreal session walks through the new Game Animation Sample project, showcasing advancements in Unreal Engine's animation systems. It highlights how users can improve their skills and access a library of over 500 ready-to-use animations.

name: How to - Editor Utility Widget [Unreal 5]
description: This step-by-step tutorial teaches how to use Unreal's Editor Utility Widget in Unreal Engine 5. It covers the basics, setup, customization, and practical applications for streamlining workflow.

name: Full custom metahuman workflow tutorial Blender Unreal Substance
description: This tutorial demonstrates a full custom Metahuman workflow using Blender, Unreal Engine, and Substance Painter. It covers steps like using Metahuman Creator, working in Blender for hair, texturing in Substance Painter, and animation tracking with the Live Link app.

name: UE5.4 State Tree Data Management
description: This video explores various ideas on how to manage data within State Trees in Unreal Engine.

name: Unreal Engine 5.3.2: State Trees Demystified (Global tasks, Parameters, etc)
description: This video demystifies State Trees in Unreal Engine 5.3.2, covering their recent addition and functionality like parameters and global tasks. It guides viewers through project setup, State Tree configuration, and understanding evaluators and tasks. The tutorial also delves into transitions, state types, and a full breakdown of state selection behavior, concluding with a demonstration of AI ships using State Trees.

name: UE5 State Trees: Huge Potential, Glaring Issues | Devlog
description: This devlog discusses the potential and issues of State Trees in Unreal Engine 5. It covers their organization improvements, flexibility, and performance, while also highlighting their experimental nature, instances of crashing UE5, and debugging challenges. The video reflects on an 'epiphany' regarding State Trees' effectiveness and references official documentation and forums.

name: Unreal Engine 5 Tutorial - AI Part 1: Character Setup
description: This video is the first part of a tutorial series on AI in Unreal Engine 5, focusing on basic character setup for AI characters. It will eventually cover examples of AI behavior typically seen in commercial video games.

name: Delegates - Unreal C++ Course #15
description: This video explores C++ scripting in Unreal Engine, noting that while Blueprints offer visual scripting, C++ provides a more performant alternative. It aims to demystify C++ in Unreal, inviting viewers to learn more about its tools.

name: How to Create a Game Instance in Unreal Engine 5 - Carry Data Between Levels
description: This quick tutorial shows how to create a game instance in Unreal Engine 5 to carry data between levels. It covers how to make a game instance and pass variables across multiple levels.

name: Chat GPT (Open AI) integrated with Unreal Engine 5 , Text To Speech
description: This video demonstrates the integration of ChatGPT (Open AI) into Unreal Engine 5, including text-to-speech functionality. It showcases how ChatGPT can be used within a game environment.

name: Unreal Engine Text to Speech (TTS)
description: This video provides a free and easy setup option for adding Text-to-Speech (TTS) to an Unreal Engine project. It covers the basic setup, calling TTS from other blueprints, and a more efficient implementation method, referencing Unreal Engine's official documentation.

name: Ep.3: Real-Time Text-to-Speech and Speech-to-Text in Qt and Unreal Engine 5
description: This third episode focuses on real-time Text-to-Speech and Speech-to-Text functionalities in Qt and Unreal Engine 5. It highlights the use of realistic voices that run locally without requiring cloud subscriptions.

name: Use AI to create a world (Blockade, Unreal Engine 5, Kaiber)
description:
This tutorial demonstrates how to leverage AI tools like Blockade Labs, Unreal Engine 5, and Kaiber to create and animate vast fantasy worlds for film. It covers creating and downloading HDR worlds, importing them into Unreal, adding characters, animating them, and setting up camera movements.

The video concludes by showing the final result and the use of Kaiber for animation, suggesting a powerful combination of tools for generating imaginative scenes.

name: ¬øDe qu√© hablan las IA cuando se quedan solas? Almudena y Victoria la Malague√±a
description: This experiment features two 3D avatars, Almudena and Victoria la Malague√±a, engaging in autonomous conversation. Almudena, a recycling expert from Madrid, and Victoria, a guide and lover of M√°laga, discuss topics ranging from recycling to M√°laga's culture, gastronomy, flamenco, Semana Santa, and Feria. The video highlights how these AI entities react and share perspectives in an unusual dialogue.

name: Simple Options Menu In Unreal UE5.2
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to create a simple options menu in Unreal Engine 5.2. It covers designing the UI, setting up the blueprint, changing and saving settings, and loading them. The video provides a step-by-step guide for implementing a functional options menu.

name: How to add custom clothes to metahumans! | Unreal Engine 5 Tutorial
description: This tutorial shows how to add custom clothes to Metahumans in Unreal Engine 5. It covers replacing the mannequin with a Metahuman, exporting and importing meshes between Unreal and Blender, transferring vertex data, and adding pants to the Metahuman. The video concludes with a final demonstration of the customized character.

name: Unreal Engine 5 (works in UE4) Mask water out of boat/ship hull
description: This instructional video demonstrates how to mask water out of boat and ship hulls using Unreal Engine's native water plugin, applicable in both UE5 and UE4 without third-party plugins. It notes an updated video for Unreal Engine 5.1 and 5.2 to address previous issues.

name: Unreal Engine 5 - X-Ray Eagle Vision
description: This instructional video demonstrates how to create an X-Ray or Eagle Vision effect in Unreal Engine 5, highlighting enemies, allies, and interactable objects.

name: Setting up OWO haptics for VRC for Hatchlings
description: This video covers setting up OWO haptics for VRC for Hatchlings.

name: ChatGPT Prompting vs RAG vs fine tuning: Aprovecha la IA al m√°ximo | #laFunci√≥n 9x18
description: This video presents three examples to differentiate between prompt engineering, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and fine-tuning AI models. Jose Luis Calvo, co-founder of Diverger AI, provides direct and concise examples to explain the fundamentals of these techniques.

name: Unreal Smart Cleaner. Reduce el espacio de tus proyectos Unreal Engine 5
description: This video introduces a free tool available on GitHub, Unreal Smart Cleaner, designed to reduce the disk space occupied by Unreal Engine 5 projects. It allows users to delete automatically generated folders and files from less frequently used projects, thus optimizing storage while keeping projects accessible.

name: Como Crear F√°cilmente un Enemigo AI en Unreal Engine 5 - Tutorial en Espa√±ol
description: This quick tutorial demonstrates how to easily create a simple AI enemy in Unreal Engine 5 that pursues, attacks, and detects the player. It guides users through the process of setting up enemy AI within the engine.

name: Introducing EasyMapper for Unreal Engine 5
description: This video introduces EasyMapper, a Master Material setup for Unreal Engine 5 that supports World-Aligned (Triplanar) texture projection, Nanite tessellation/displacement, and Advanced Vertex Blending. It allows blending up to three materials in a single package for easy texture blending across assets.

name: AI NPCs Take Action from Conversation | Environment and Object Aware Characters | Convai UE Tutorial
description: This Convai Unreal Engine tutorial demonstrates how to make AI NPCs feel more lifelike by enabling conversations to trigger behaviors and actions, including interactions with the environment or other characters. Convai's NPCs can interpret complex verbal instructions and convert them into natural in-game actions, such as fetching items, following/leading characters, or executing dynamically requested tasks during gameplay.

name: Portal to another level in Unreal - Unreal Blueprints Tutorial 22 üöÄ
description: This Unreal Blueprints tutorial (part 22) uncovers the process of creating portals for seamless level transitions in Unreal Engine. It guides users step-by-step to master this technique and enhance game design skills.

name: Generate 3D Sets for your Short Films!
description: This video shows how to use AI tools to create virtual environments for film projects, covering the entire workflow from generating 3D environments to filming in a low-budget virtual production setup. It also includes tips for compositing shots with AI, such as re-lighting based on the created environment.

name: Best Quest 3 Settings to Enable on DAY 1!
description: This video provides essential settings to enable on a new Meta Quest 3 (or any Quest) headset from day one.

name: Meta Quest 3: How to Activate Hand Tracking
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to activate the hand tracking feature on a Meta Quest 3, allowing users to interact without controllers. It provides a step-by-step guide to ditching controllers and using hands instead.

name: Hand Tracking Updates and Resources | Oculus For Developers
description: Developer Advocate Cami Williams discusses the latest updates to hand tracking and essential information for implementation. Topics include an overview of the Hands API, updates in the v28 Release, and High Frequency Hand Tracking.

name: How To Use VIRTUAL REALITY In Unreal Engine 5 | Beginner Tutorial
description: This beginner tutorial guides users on how to set up and use Virtual Reality (VR) in Unreal Engine 5. It covers connecting a Quest 2 headset to Unreal Engine, creating bespoke pickup actors, and setting up VR in a custom scene with user-owned content. By the end, users will have their Quest 2 connected and be able to create custom VR interactions.

name: Unreal Engine 5 360 Panoramic EASY! | No coding No Plugins
description: This tutorial shows how to render out a 360 panoramic image or video natively in Unreal Engine 5, without requiring blueprints or plugins. It covers additional render passes, panoramic rendering settings, allocating history per pane, and converting 8K to 4K resolution using Adobe Media Encoder.

name: Virtual Production at Home at ZERO Cost: A New Era of Filmmaking
description: This video explores virtual production at home with zero cost, marking a new era of filmmaking. It encourages viewers to explore various resources for workshops, film festivals, and masterclasses to enhance their filmmaking skills. The content also features cinematic LUTs and gear recommendations.

name: Felicitaci√≥n Navide√±a 2024 (4K)
description: This video is a Christmas greeting created with Unreal Engine, featuring familiar characters like Victoria la Malague√±a, a Metahuman, and a dog named Yuri. It acknowledges some humorous inconsistencies, such as robot-like movement and a beach in Bethlehem.

name: Customise your MetaHuman | Unreal Engine 5 Tutorial
description:
This tutorial offers an ultimate guide to MetaHuman customization using Unreal Engine 5, Blender, and Adobe Substance Painter, presenting an efficient workflow without additional paid plugins. It covers customizing MetaHuman mesh, skin texture, eyes, and teeth.

It also teaches how to attach items like lightsabers, horns, hats, and glasses to MetaHumans in Blueprint, import hair/groom assets, and perform basic texturing in Substance Painter, including baking high poly details onto low poly models with normal maps.

name: Texture Tilling Issue in Unreal Engine Solved!
description: This video provides a solution for visible texture tiling on large landscapes in Unreal Engine. It introduces Unreal Terrains texture pack, which includes Distance Blending and UV Scrambling tools to easily prevent visual repetitions. The pack offers 250 materials, including beaches, deserts, forests, glaciers, jungles, mountains, and wetlands, designed to save significant time.

name: VR with Unreal Engine 5 - Full Beginner Course
description: This is a full beginner course on VR with Unreal Engine 5. It covers VR headset setup, VR project settings, UE5 light setup, Nanite and Datasmith, and materials using Quixel Bridge. The tutorial also includes creating emissive projectiles, interacting with a door, moving the sun in VR, and final adjustments for publishing.

name: ¬°Convierte TUS V√çDEOS en ESCENAS 3D! - Tutorial Gaussian Splatting
description: This tutorial teaches how to use PolyCam and Luma Labs to create 3D Gaussian Splatting from videos or images. It allows users to reconstruct hyperrealistic 3D scenes in minutes, revive memories, re-record videos, or explore the potential of this revolutionary 3D technique.

name: VIVE Mars CamTrack and Aximmetry DE setup guide
description: This video provides a setup guide for VIVE Mars CamTrack and Aximmetry DE.

name: Unreal y C++: Sistema de escalada. Trepar #4
description: This video shows how to create a climbing system for a third-person character in Unreal Engine from scratch using C++.

name: Webinar: Taller de ideas para Producci√≥n Virtual, plantillas para mi proyecto de Unreal Engine.
description: This webinar, presented by Rafa L√≥pez, focuses on virtual production ideas and templates for Unreal Engine projects. It aims to help users explore Unreal Engine's capabilities, concretize their ideas, and learn more about Virtual Production.

name: Creating a custom morph target for Metahuman's face
description:
This video demonstrates how to add a custom morph target to a Metahuman head in Blender while preserving all LODs, which is crucial for optimized models. The tutorial covers importing Metahumans to Unreal, preparing and exporting as FBX, fixing FBX with Autodesk converter, and importing into Blender.

It also details creating custom morph targets, transferring them to higher LODs, exporting from Blender, and reimporting to Unreal. The video concludes with instructions on fixing materials and hair, and a final demonstration.

name: I went through ALL Unreal Engine Plugins, here is what I found
description: This video reviews and showcases various Unreal Engine 5 plugins, offering insights into what's worth exploring for game development, whether for beginners or seasoned pros. It aims to help users become better game developers by highlighting useful plugins for cinematics, Sequencer, and Lumen.

name: Integrating Convai Action API In Unreal Engine
description: This tutorial offers an in-depth look at the Convai Action API for Unreal Engine, recommending users watch the Unreal quick start video first. It provides step-by-step guidance on implementing various actions such as move, stop, wait, pick up, drop, and color change. The video also explains how to change the default pawn class, add features or content packs for movement, and includes practical examples and a deep dive into the companion blueprint.

name: Leveling Up with the Smartest AI NPCs for Games
description:
This video introduces Inworld AI NPCs, designed to offer next-level role-playing and immersion in games by possessing a mind of their own. It showcases them in action across various experiences and community-created mods, emphasizing their capabilities in learning, adapting, emotional navigation, memory, recall, and adherence to a '4th wall'.

Inworld's Character Engine goes beyond traditional LLMs and chatbots, enabling developers to create AI-driven non-player characters with complex and lifelike human behaviors. This enhances immersion for players, as NPCs can autonomously initiate goals, perform actions, and follow motivations that drive the narrative and integrate with the broader player experience.

name: Fixing Live Link XR in Unreal Engine 5.2 and 5.3
description: This quick tip shows how to fix issues with Vive trackers not appearing in Unreal Engine 5.2 and 5.3. It demonstrates creating a shortcut to start the Unreal Editor with a command that enables VR tracking and input in standard playmode, benefiting virtual production, mocap artists, and VTubers.

name: Crear Ropa para Metahumanos. Marvelous Designer. UE5. Parte 1
description: This video tutorial demonstrates how to create clothing for Metahumans in Marvelous Designer for use in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Como cambiar la ropa de tu METAHUMAN con Blender y UNREAL ENGINE 5
description: This tutorial shows how to change Metahuman clothing using Blender and Unreal Engine 5. It covers model preparation, adjusting the Metahuman skeleton, transferring information to the new model, refining the result, and exporting/importing. The video also includes a bonus tip for replacing models.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 16: Colored Smoke & Skeletal Mesh
description: This video is part 16 of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, focusing on creating colored smoke effects and working with skeletal meshes.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 15: Smoke Portal
description: This video is part 15 of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, focusing on creating a smoke portal effect.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 14: Intro to FLIP Fluid Simulations
description: This video is part 14 of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, providing an introduction to FLIP Fluid Simulations. It is suitable for beginners.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 13: Force Field Part 3
description: This video is the third part of the Niagara VFX Crash Course series, focusing on creating a force field effect.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 12: Force Field Part 2
description: This video is the second part of the Niagara VFX Crash Course series, continuing the creation of a force field effect.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 11: Force Field Part 1
description: This video is the first part of the Niagara VFX Crash Course series, focusing on how to create a force field effect.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 10: Charge and Explode Part 3
description: This video is the third part of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, continuing the tutorial on creating a charge and explode effect.

description: This video is the second part of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, continuing the tutorial on creating a charge and explode effect.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 08: Charge and Explode Part 1
description: This video is the first part of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, focusing on how to create a charge and explode effect.

name: Niagara VFX Crash Course 07: Flamethrower
description: This video is part 7 of the Niagara VFX Crash Course, focusing on creating a flamethrower effect.
